titles: His Maiesties letter to the maior of Kingston upon Hull, 25. of Aprill. 1642. To our trusty and welbeloved, the major, aldermen, and burgesses of our towne and port of Kingston upon Hull.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publisher: Printed at Yorke and now re-imprinted in London,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
